long_description: Taking critical feedback from military personnel and applying decades of knife design experience, Gerber built the Propel Downrange AO Knife, offering a full-size tactical tool with a slim profile. Assisted Opening 2.0 design delivers flawless 1-handed operation; you can count on the plunge lock and safety switch to keep the blade secure under pressure. Premium S30V steel blade with black oxide coating keeps a stealthy profile. Tanto-style blade is partially serrated for slicing and cutting tough surfaces. Composite handle maintains a slim profile that complements the knife's balanced feel and provides secure handling in all conditions. 3-way adjustable clip customizes the knife's orientation in your pocket or on your belt; you can set it for tip-up or tip-down storage and left-hand or right-hand convenience.
short_description: Taking critical feedback from military personnel and applying decades of knife design experience, Gerber built the Propel Downrange AO Knife, offering a full-size tactical tool with a slim profile.
